description.main: Tele Airdrop Bot lets you create a Telegram Mini App for airdrop campaigns in just a few seconds, making it easy to manage and distribute rewards efficiently. Users can personalize themes, set up referral systems, and manage tasks easily for a seamless airdrop experience.
description.connection: This app will connect to your Telegram bot, so you'll need to provide your bot's username and token to manage the app in PinkSale.
